title: Loving Hut Hoa Dang
description: Formerly Hoa Dang, changed to a branch of Loving Hut international chain of vegan food restaurants by disciples of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Serves vegan food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and desserts. Very spacious with many tables, nice interior. Upstairs is a well-stocked shop selling imported food like Tofurky roast, Daiya cheese, vegan chocolate alongside staples like tvp, dry noodles, and products from Whole Foods Market 365 range. English menu available. Wi-fi.
streetAddress: 38 Huynh Khuong Ninh, P DaKao, Q1
